forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 7C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 40F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
